text: Frederick Nathaniel "Toots" Hibbert, O.J. (8 December 1942 â€“ 11 September 2020) was a Jamaican singer-songwriter and guitarist. He was known as the leader for the reggae and ska band Toots & the Maytals. His 1968 song "Do the Reggay" is a well known raggae song. He was born in May Pen, Colony of Jamaica. In August 2020, Hibbert was hospitalized with COVID-19 and put in a coma in Saint Andrew Parish, Jamaica.Toots Hibbert hospitalized in intensive care He died on 11 September 2020 from the infection, aged 77. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Jamaican singer-songwriters Category:Guitarists Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Jamaica Category:Jamaican reggae musicians
title: Toots Hibbert
